errors.error_description: Contradictory version compatibility statement claiming the project requires Python 3.8+ but is also compatible with Python 2.7, which is impossible
correction_candidates: Remove the Python 2.7 compatibility claim and keep only Python 3.8+ requirement
Change the requirement to Python 2.7+ and remove Python 3.8+ mention
Specify that Python 2.7 support was dropped and only Python 3.8+ is supported
Update to require Python 3.9+ for better compatibility
errors.golden_answer: Remove the Python 2.7 compatibility claim and keep only Python 3.8+ requirement

errors.error_description: Installing taipy package with version constraint when the repository is archived and users should refer to the main taipy repository instead
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install command since the repository is archived
Change to pip install taipy-core for the specific archived component
Add instructions to clone the main taipy repository instead
Update the command to pip install taipy[all] for full installation
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install command since the repository is archived
